website_summaries.verdict: KEF's stunningly styled egg-shaped speaker package, the KHT-3005, boasts audiophile-quality sound for music and impressive home-theater performance.
pros: The KEF KHT-3005 is one compact, beautifully designed speaker package with solid aluminum satellites that feature unique driver technology to produce incredible clarity
Meanwhile, the equally astounding dual 10-inch, 250-watt powered subwoofer delivers ultradeep bass
cons: Finicky setup required to produce best sound

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: The system set-up is straight forward and the speakers' adjustable stands/wall mounts are excellent. The subwoofer is truly outstanding and I did not have any trouble balancing the system's sound. I would recommend a receiver with an adjustable frequency crossover for the main speakers and the subwoofer as this system lacks that. My receiver is several years old and does not have that feature, but I was able to balance the sound by moving the subwoofer around. A new receiver is in my plans anyway. The sound is excellent with highly detailed highs, wide dispersion, clear midrange and very good bass. They are attractive and unobtrusive in my room. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price !
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these speakers in April of 2010. Still sound great. No problems with them at all
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: Some have complained that the bass doesn't kick enough. I think it may be your reciever or your subwoofer cord. One I bought a highend subwoffer cord these babies can rattle the walls and wake the dead. I have no regret in purchasing them, and want to buy another sub woffer since I have a 7.2 reciever.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This is a full 5.1 channel home theater system with very clean and full sound. The subwoofer is self-powered and fills the room with plenty of bass. The very interesting Uni-Q driver with "tangerine" wave guide provides a seamless sound from satellite to satellite. These sound great with my Yamaha RX-A820. I am considering buying two more of the satellites in order to move the system up to the 7.1 sound. These satellites are a little larger than most satellites, more along the lines of a small bookshelf. They are beautifully constructed of high-quality materials. Glad I purchased through Amazon.com, which is a KEF certified dealer, at a low price of $1199.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brice

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: it's awesome in sound and appearance. but wish I would have waited, now that the price have decrease at lease $300. purchased this system for christmas... is it too late for rebate for sale price difference?
customer_reviews.author: Alvin L. Haskins

customer_reviews.title: KEF
customer_reviews.text: Awsome speaker system. I was skeptical about this small size system, but WOW!!!!!!!! These speakers deliver! I wish the subwoofer was easier to get loud enough, but once that was accomplished, -----WOW!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harold D. May

customer_reviews.title: Small space? GIANT sound!
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted these for a few years now. Recently purchased and now posess what are GREAT speakers!. Great sound, bass, and imaging...couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Michael Munoz

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much can be said of these speakers except they are simply FANTASTIC. Have had many mid-line speaker sets but am certainly satisfied with these. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: BigBee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: After researching surround sound systems for the better part of a year I locked onto this one. When it went on as a lightning deal I didn't hesitate to pick it up and have been totally thrilled with it since its purchase. As you've probably read, opening up the beautifully packaged speakers is part of the fun. They are an amazing looking and sounding system. I listen to music and watch movies through them and love every minute of it! If your serious about getting a great surround sound system do not go any farther, you found it. If I had heard these speakers before I bought them, they would have been purchased long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cirria

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in glossy black!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! I just installed the KEF3005 SE 5.1 system with my Onkyo SR805 AV Receiver and Pioneer Kuro Plasma. The sound is beautiful...rich and warm with every, high,low and mid range beautifully produced and very clear with no distortion at any volume. They sound just as perfect loud as they do at lower volumes. You would really think that they were much larger speakers. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Barry K.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews about these KEF KHT3005BL (SE) speakers on numerous sites, I decided to take the plunge and pick these up. They're really wonderful looking speakers with a sound that belies their small size. They fill a medium sized room with great sound and the subwoofer is just seamless and is paired wonderfully. I'd definitely recommend picking up a set and checking them out yourself. I didn't buy these on Amazon.com though as they're priced at $1,750 as of the day I'm writing this review. I picked mine up back in November '09 for about $1,100 at a different website. Definitely worth the price and they're good-looking to match.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tsang

customer_reviews.title: ... this set back in 2008 and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set back in 2008 and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I"ve had these speakers for about 4 years now and still am amazed by them every time I pop a movie or cd in. I have since added a pair of Kef IQ9's to make them 7.1(.2 with my extra sub). The clarity without a harsh overly bright sound is what drew me to them. I don't really compare them to a Bose or anything as they are in an entirely different league hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty L. Rising

customer_reviews.title: Just another addition to the collection of 5-star reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile, so I cannot give you an expert opinion on the Kef 3005 speaker system. Having said that the sound is incredible! I could not ask for more. In addition, these speakers are beautiful! I have had these for a year now. The unpacking process alone was pure enjoyment (beautifully packed!). The subwoofer is one of a kind. I use them with a Denon AVR888 A/V receiver.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: After months of research I purchased these speakers and use them with an Onkyo receiver and a Samsung DLP tv. Great sound with the 5.1 channel. Now I am adding another two Kef speakers to make it a 7.1 channel output. I am totally impressed with the size and quality of output.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adoni

customer_reviews.title: Best Home Theater under $5000
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to get Bowers and Wilkins (MT-30) home theater, but suddenly changed my mind and get KEF KHT3005SE. I bought this system almost a year, and couldn't be happier to have it. Love the elegance looks, sturdy and strong, and the most important is the sound quality. Hear the sound very clear and crisp, with the great punch of the sub-woofer.
customer_reviews.author: ajey

customer_reviews.title: killer sound and they look great
customer_reviews.text: I was in the Market for my first ever "nice" set of speakers and did a lot of research. In addition to my own desire for great sound, I needed speakers that would look good to my girlfriend. Since we are renting I could not put them in the walls or anything. These look really sharp with my Samsung plasma screen.
customer_reviews.author: rwilson

customer_reviews.title: you have to hear it to believe it: flawless to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: when i was shopping for a new system i had no intention spending that much for a system or speakers that is, and if i did i always thought i would be bying a bose, but once i heard it, it blew me away. prior to my purchase i compared the kef speakers with the top of the line bose system in a store, and honestly, the kef speakers had no competition. i also like the design of these speakers, the subwoofer is unbelievable! if you're going to buy these speakers i highly recommend getting the harman kardon av 340 reciever, in order to get maximum performance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zaltsman

customer_reviews.title: KEF KHT 3005 Home theater speakers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers and good price at $1300. The subwoofer is house shattering!! I use them with my Onkyo 606 which seems to be a good match.
customer_reviews.author: T. Godfrey

product_meta.title: KEF KHT3005BL (SE) 5.1 Home Theater Speaker System (Gloss Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The KEF KHT3005 (SE) 5.1 home theater speaker system is an extremely high performance, yet room-friendly home theater system, which raises both the design and performance benchmarks in the category of elegant home theater speaker packages. KEF's patented "sit anywhere" Uni-Q driver configuration places the tweeter in the acoustic center of the bass/midrange cone. This creates a single focused audio source that disperses the sound image evenly throughout the room so that everyone enjoys the full richness of music or movie soundtracks. The Uni-Q array in the 3000 series has a completely new design which performs better than ever. Instead of having identical center and satellite speakers like other systems, KEF's created a stunning new dedicated center channel that gives dialogue more weight and clarity delivering cinema-like frontal impact. KEF also added a radical new high performance powered subwoofer. As a system, it certainly puts the 'live' into living room.
feature_bullets: Each satellite features KEF's high output aluminum 115-millimeter (4.5 inch) Uni-Q drivers
Cast aluminum cabinets with integrated foot stand / wall mount
Features KEF's patented SST technology for higher sound quality at higher volumes
